config.mode.name: Game Mode
config.mode.tooltip: Standalone = Mod works by self and doesn't use UnifiedExperienceSystem for Leveling, UnifiedExperience = If Unified Experience System Mod Exists with this mode, Spinning will require you learn the ability and so this mode also overrides config options like stamina drain and radius.
config.AbilityUses.name: Ability Uses
config.AbilityUses.tooltip: Choose if Energy or Stamina will be used for the spin ability
